column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Raiko says : " How did this Cultural Center attack happen right under your nose ?
#Text=" Raiko says : " Well , work harder !
#Text=If you do n't get any results soon , I 'm going to find someone who can .
#Text=" Mako says : " I got a break in the bombing case .
#Text=I I.D. 'd the guy I saw at the scene .
#Text=" Lu says : " That 's great , Mako .
#Text=" Gang says : " Yeah , you better run that in to Beifong right now .
#Text=" Mako says : " You think ?
#Text=" Lu says : " Sure .
#Text=You 're gon na be a hero !
#Text=" Lin says : " What makes a rookie beat cop think he can interrupt my meeting with the President ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'm sorry , I just -- um , I found something out about the bombing .
#Text=" Lin says : " Well , give it to Lu and Gang , you moron .
#Text=Now get out !
#Text=" Lu says : " Sorry .
#Text=Was she busy ?
#Text=" Mako says : " This is the guy I saw sneaking out of the building right before the explosions .
#Text=He 's a member of the Agni Kais .
#Text=Someone must have hired him to make it look like Northerners attacked the Cultural Center .
#Text=" Gang says : " Hmm .
#Text=" Mako says : " Did you learn anything about that remote control I found at the scene ?
#Text=That 's got ta be the key to finding out who 's really responsible .
#Text=" Lu says : " Listen , kid , it was the Northern Water Tribe , okay ?
#Text=" Gang says : " Yeah , give it a rest , Super Cop .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 've heard good things about you .
#Text=You 've made some big triad busts for a rookie .
#Text=" Mako says : " Thank you , sir .
#Text=" Raiko says : " And you 're dating the Avatar , right ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yes , sir .
#Text=" Raiko says : " I 'm concerned that she might be getting some bad advice from Varrick .
#Text=You would n't happen to know if they 're plotting anything that might compromise the security of Republic City , would you , officer ?
#Text=Let me remind you that you 've sworn an oath .
#Text=You 're a man of the law before anything else .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yes , sir .
#Text=" Raiko says : " Well , keep up the good work .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wait , there 's something you should know .
#Text="
